mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_SUBJECT (sub_No, categ, area, sub_Name, score, publication, guide) VALUES(seq_sub.nextval, #{categ}, #{area}, #{subName}, #{score}, #{publication}, #{guide})
mapper.select: SELECT sub_No, categ, area, sub_Name, score, guide, publication, regdate FROM TBL_SUBJECT WHERE sub_No = #{subNo}

SELECT rownum rnum, s.categ, s.area, s.sub_Name, s.publication, s.score, a.ac_Date FROM TBL_SUBJECT s, TBL_APPLY s WHERE s.sub_No = a.sub_No AND a.applyState IN('승인');
